#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int dig(int n,int x)
{
        while ( n > 0 ) {
                if ( n%10 == x ) return 1;
                n = n/10;
        }
        return 0;
}
 
int main()
{
        int n,x,y,i,c;  
        cin >> n;
        
        while ( n-- ) {
                cin >> x >> y;
                i = 1;
                c = 0;
                while ( c < x ) {
                        if ( dig(i,y) != 1 ) {
                                c++;
                        } 
                        i++;
                }
                printf("\n%d\n", i-1);
        }
        return 0;
}
